The hotel is surrounded by 30.000 square metres of Mediterranean garden and provides free high speed WiFi in all areas.

Each room comes with a full HD Led TV with satellite channels, extra large bedding, a mini bar and a work desk. The rooms are furnished with natural wood, large windows and a seating area, with either a garden or boulevard view. Complimentary water, as well as coffee & tea facilities are provided.

Rogner Hotel Tiranas restaurant offers breakfast buffet every morning. A wide range of à la carte delicacies from Austrian and Mediterranean as well as local cuisine can be selected for lunch or dinner.

Guests are welcome to enjoy the hotels swimming pool set amidst palm trees, as well as other activities including: tennis court, the Spa and Hammam centre, sauna, and a gym.

There is an optional shuttle service available to Tirana International Airport Nënë Tereza. The National Historic Museum is just 700 metres away. Set in the very centre of Tirana, just a short walk from Skenderberg Square, SarOtel offers an on-site bar, a common terrace free WiFi and secured parking.

Each room at the SarOtel is modernly furnished and well-lit. They all feature a flat-screen TV, air-conditioning, a minibar and a desk and chair. Private bathroom provides a shower. Most rooms also offer a balcony.

Breakfast is provided daily and includes local dishes or gluten-free food. On-site sauna and hammam are available at no additional cost for hotel guests. The hotel also offers a business conference room.

Various night clubs can be found close to the hotel, while tourist agencies that organise trips are located close by. The Albanian National Museum is 150 metres away. Guests can also visit the Fine Arts Gallery and the Petrela and Preza Castles, just a short walk away.

Local buses stop 100 metres from the hotel, while the Main Train Station is 600 metres away. Tirana Airport is 18 km away. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Featuring an outdoor pool, on-site bar, restaurant and free Wi-Fi, Palace Hotel & SPA is next to the sea and has its own private beach area. The centre of Durres is 4 km away. Guests enjoy free Spa services that include an indoor pool, saunas, hot tubs and a gym.

Luxury decorated, all rooms and suites are air-conditioned and comprise a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a sofa seating. The bathroom includes a shower and free wardrobe and toiletries. Some units offer a furnished balcony and sea views.

Palace Hotel & SPA also houses a grocery store, a currency exchange office and car rental service. Business centre and banquet facilities are available at a surcharge. Each weekend during the high season, guests can enjoy live music at the hotel.

The Old Town of Durres, preserving Amphitheater, Venetian Tower and an Antique Thermals, is 4 km away.

There is a bus stop only 10 metres from the property. Durres Ferry Port with lines to Ancona and Bari is located 4 km away. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 30 km, and shuttle service is possible at a surcharge.

Main Bus and Train Stations can be reached in 6 km, while the local buses stop 500 metres away. Tirana Airport is located 29 km away.
